annotations.annotation: as added Feb. 26, 2015, D.C. Law 20-155, § 5162, 61 DCR 9990; renumbered 8e

For temporary (90 days) addition of this section, see § 5162 of the Fiscal Year 2015 Budget Support Second Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2014 (D.C. Act 20-566, January 9, 2015, 62 DCR 884, 21 STAT 541).

For temporary (90 days) addition of this section, see § 5162 of the Fiscal Year 2015 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2014 (D.C. Act 20-449, October 10, 2014, 61 DCR 10915, 20 STAT 4188).
For temporary (90 days) addition of this section, see § 5172 of the Fiscal Year 2015 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2014 (D.C. Act 20-377, July 14, 2014, 61 DCR 7598, 20 STAT 3696).
For temporary (90 days) creation of § 4-753.08, see § 2(b) of Emergency Rental Assistance Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Act 23-455, Nov. 4, 2020, 67 DCR 13218).
For temporary (225 days) creation of § 4-753.08, see § 2(b) of Emergency Rental Assistance Reform Temporary Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Law 23-254, Mar. 16, 2021, 67 DCR 13955).
For temporary (90 days) creation of § 4-753.08, see § 2 of Emergency Rental Assistance Reform Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-50, Mar. 30, 2021, 68 DCR 003464).
